titles.title: Guide Me O Thou Great Jehovah

authors.author: Harry E. Fosdick John Hughes Peter William William

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Guide me, O Thou great Jehovah, newline Pilgrim through this barren land; newline I am weak, but Thou art mighty, newline Hold me with Thy pow'rful hand. newline Bread of heaven, Bread of heaven, newline Feed me till I want no more; newline Feed me till I want no more.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Open now the crystal fountain, newline Whence the healing stream doth flow; newline Let the fire and cloudy pillar newline Lead me all my journey through. newline Strong Deliverer, strong Deliverer, newline Be Thou still my strength and shield; newline Be Thou still my strength and shield.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: When I tread the verge of Jordan, newline Bid my anxious fears subside; newline Bear me thro' the swelling current, newline Land me safe on Canaan's side. newline Songs and praises, songs and praises, newline I will ever give to Thee; newline I will ever give to Thee.
